trans-unit.source: This setting allows you to specify the DNS server that you want to use for name resolution for this virtual network.
trans-unit.target: This setting allows you to specify the DNS server that you want to use for name resolution for this virtual network.

trans-unit.source: It does not create a DNS server.
trans-unit.target: It does not create a DNS server.

trans-unit.source: On the **Settings** page for your virtual network, navigate to **DNS Servers** and click to open the DNS servers blade.
trans-unit.target: On the **Settings** page for your virtual network, navigate to **DNS Servers** and click to open the DNS servers blade.

trans-unit.source: On the **DNS Servers** page, under **DNS servers**, select **Custom DNS**.
trans-unit.target: On the **DNS Servers** page, under **DNS servers**, select **Custom DNS**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Primary DNS server** field, enter the IP address of the DNS server that you want to use for name resolution.
trans-unit.target: In the **Primary DNS server** field, enter the IP address of the DNS server that you want to use for name resolution.

trans-unit.source: Click **Save** at the top of the blade to save your configuration.
trans-unit.target: Click **Save** at the top of the blade to save your configuration.
